text: Joshua Wise (born February 7, 1983) is a former American racing driver. He raced in NASCAR from 2007-2016, but had almost no success. Wise is known for being sponsored by Dogecoin during 4 races in 2014 and 2015. He was born in Riverside, California. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:American racecar drivers Category:NASCAR drivers Category:Sportspeople from California Category:People from Riverside, California
title: Josh Wise
